name: acre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 a unit for measuring area, equal to 4,047 square metres or 4,840 square yards: He's got 400 acres of land in Russia.
More examplesFewer examplesThe mansion is set in 90 acres of beautiful, unspoilt countryside.The college is surrounded by 70 acres of parkland.The Forestry Commission is responsible for preserving over 2 million acres of woodland.Major wildfires have destroyed thousands of acres in Idaho, Oregon and Montana.The field was about ten acres in size.
